body:
Yes, I did. My cmake command:

```
cmake .. -A x64 -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release ^
More? -DSWIG_EXECUTABLE=C:/swigwin/swig.exe ^
More? -DPYTHON_EXECUTABLE=C:/Users/Dmitry/AppData/Local/Programs/Python/Python36/python.exe ^
More? -DPYTHON_LIBRARIES=C:/Users/Dmitry/AppData/Local/Programs/Python/Python36/libs/python36.lib ^
More? -Dtensorflow_ENABLE_GPU=ON ^
More? -DCUDNN_HOME="C:/Program Files/NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit/CUDA/v8.0"

```
